block.p: Madelyn Helene Bucksbaum and Allen Paul Adamson are to be married this evening in New York. Rabbi Norman J. Cohen is to perform the ceremony at the Hudson Theater.

The bride, 41, operates Harmony Partners, a marketing service for investment managers. She graduated from Stanford University and received an M.B.A. from the University of California at Los Angeles. She is the daughter of Dorothy and Maurice Bucksbaum of Des Moines and Boca Raton, Fla.

The bride, 41, operates Harmony Partners, a marketing service for investment managers. She graduated from Stanford University and received an M.B.A. from the University of California at Los Angeles. She is the daughter of Dorothy and Maurice Bucksbaum of Des Moines and Boca Raton, Fla.

The bridegroom, 40, is the managing director of the New York office of Landor Associates, corporate marketing and identity consultants. He is also an adjunct professor of marketing at New York University, where he received an M.B.A. He graduated from Syracuse University. He is a son of Ruth and Joe Adamson of Rye Brook, N.Y.
